targets.rawSql: SELECT order_created_ts AS time, order_type, pick_sla_status, stage_sla_status, ship_sla_status FROM order_sla_evaluation WHERE order_type = '${order_type}' AND current_status = '${workflow_status}' AND order_created_ts >= $__timeFrom() AND order_created_ts < $__timeTo() ORDER BY order_created_ts

SELECT order_id, order_type, current_status, pick_sla_status, stage_sla_status, ship_sla_status, pick_duration_minutes, stage_duration_minutes, pack_ship_duration_minutes, total_cycle_time_minutes, order_created_ts FROM order_sla_evaluation WHERE order_type = '${order_type}' AND current_status = '${workflow_status}' AND order_created_ts >= $__timeFrom() AND order_created_ts < $__timeTo() ORDER BY order_created_ts DESC LIMIT 500

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT order_type FROM sla_dashboard_summary ORDER BY order_type;
list.label: Order Type
list.name: order_type
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT order_type FROM sla_dashboard_summary ORDER BY order_type;

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT current_status FROM sla_dashboard_summary ORDER BY current_status;
list.label: Workflow Stage
list.name: workflow_status
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT current_status FROM sla_dashboard_summary ORDER BY current_status;
